description:
HEX is a platform specialized in the development and operation of personal health record management applications based on a multidimensional structure blockchain “X.blockchain platform”

Personal health record is generated from various systems such as medical institutions visit and personal bio-signal measurement devices. It will be converted and collected into the international standard FHIR message, and the FHIR message helps consistent and integrated management of personal health record as “longitudinal life record”. Also, individual dose data received from radiological examinations of medical institutions can be collected and utilized for each medical institution through the internationally accepted DICOM (Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine) standard.These data can be securely managed in HEX to meet various use cases. Also user can provide their own de-identified health information for health research, which makes user to be paid according to the HEX rewarding system.
name: Health Evolution on X.blockchain
